mmgenome
  • Reference

mmgenome: multi-metagenome

Tools for extracting individual genomes from metagenomes

Individual functions

  • mmload: Merge data function.

  • mmimport: Import data function.

  • mmplot: Default plot function.

  • mmplot_selction: Highlights a selection made with mmplot_locater on a mmplot.

  • mmplot_locator: Adds "locator" functionallity to ggplot2 objects.

  • mmplot_pairs: Pairs plot.

  • mmplot_network: Network plot.

  • mmextract: Extracts a subset of scaffolds based on input from mmplot_locator.

  • mmextract_network: Extracts PE/MP connected scaffolds.

  • mmsubset: Subset scaffolds based on the normal subset syntax.

  • mmstats: An overview of key statistics of the scaffolds.

  • mmref: Compare essential gene content to selected references.

  • mmexport: Export selected scaffolds to fasta file.

Contents

  • Individual functions
